Brief Description: Configure visual display geometry and appearance for both subject and experimenter.
Set analog and digital IO channels for the DataPixx interface box.
Set parameters for eye-tracker calibration in order to convert analog eye signals into screen coordinates.
Set parameters for liquid reward delivery schedule.
Set experimenter keyboard shortcuts that are active while the experiment is running.
Set parameters for saving data from Matlab during experiments.
Set parameters for pulling and pushing NTB code updates from GitHub.
Set parameters for communication with National Instruments (NI) data acquisition systems.
